stripped_text: Interrupt -> trash: Prevent up to X core damage or net damage. Trash cards from the top of your stack equal to the amount of damage prevented. X is equal to the number of other installed copies of Ramujan-reliant 550 BMI plus 1. Limit 6 per deck.
